job_title: Product Manager with Front end/ Back end/ API developers
jd: From: Princy Jain, Maintec princy@maintec.com Reply to: princy@maintec.com Job Title: Product Manager with Front end/ Back end/ API developersLocation: Plano, TX 75202 (*HYBRID - onsite 3 days per week)Duration: 12+ MonthsProject: Web - Shop & PurchaseTelecom client*** Local candidates only in Plano, TX*** Position is on-site 3 days per week, moving to 5 days per week in 2025*** Hours are 9:00a-5:00pTOP 5 SKILLS REQUIRED:1) Comfortable speaking with Front end/ Back end/ API developers2) Extremely clear and articulate communications skills3) Previous product management experience in online ecommerce role4) Demonstrated experience using data to drive product management experience.5) Self starter who can navigate in a complicated corporate environment.6. Previous experience in the online payments space a plus.
